title: M
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''m''' will bring up your skills menu.
*Pressing '''M''' will bring up the spell memorization menu.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''m''' represents a [[list of merfolk|merfolk]]-type monster.
*'''M''' represents a [[List of mummies|mummy]]-type monster.
